page.title: 06Nurseries 1
page.content: There are many nurseries closely situated,some growing for distribution to wholesalers,and others for direct sale to the public. Glasshouses feature predominantly on the map. { Marlwood Nursery}in Silver Street professes to be a leader in modern methods of producing{cucumbers}.Large glasshouses are packed with cucumbers grown on rockwool, not straw bales, and water and feed are monitored by computer .Computers also control the heating and ventilation, this has obvious advantages but also requires someone to be on site 24 hours a day in case of electrical or gas failure. { Shallowmead Nurseries}near Boldre, situated by the Shallows of Lymington River, specialises in{tomatoes}.There is a total of{15 acres}with 5 quarter acre glasshouses. They have 9 full- time workers and 7 part-time.
